table.name: civicrm_campagnodon_transaction
table.comment: Campagnodon transaction. Groups contact/contributions/payments/... related to a donation or adhesion coming from SPIP Campagnodon plugin.

field.name: id
field.comment: Unique CampagnodonTransaction ID

field.name: idx
field.comment: The campagnodon key as given by the origin system (SPIP, ...). A string like: spip/12345.

field.name: operation_type
field.comment: The operation type given by the origin system. Example: donation, membership, ... Can be any string, only used to filter transactions.

field.name: start_date
field.comment: The datetime at which this transaction started.

field.name: status
field.comment: The status of the transaction.

field.name: tax_receipt
field.comment: True if the user want a tax receipt

field.name: payment_url
field.comment: The url to pay the subscriptions.

field.name: transaction_url
field.comment: The url to the original transaction.

field.name: payment_instrument_id
field.title: Payment Method ID
field.comment: FK to Payment Instrument

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: FK to Contact

field.name: original_contact_id
field.comment: The contact id when this transaction was created. So we can know if there was a deduplication afterward.

field.name: new_contact
field.comment: True if the contact was created for this transaction.

field.name: campaign_id
field.title: Campaign ID
field.comment: The campaign for which this Campagnodon transaction is attached.

field.name: email
field.title: Email
field.comment: Email address

field.name: source
field.title: Source
field.comment: Origin of this Transaction.

field.name: prefix_id
field.title: Individual Prefix
field.comment: Prefix or Title for name (Ms, Mr...). FK to prefix ID

field.name: first_name
field.comment: First Name.

field.name: last_name
field.comment: Last Name.

field.name: birth_date
field.comment: Date of birth

field.name: street_address
field.title: Street Address
field.comment: Concatenation of all routable street address components (prefix, street number, street name, suffix, unit number OR P.O. Box). Apps should be able to determine physical location with this data (for mapping, mail delivery, etc.).

field.name: postal_code
field.title: Postal Code
field.comment: Store both US (zip5) AND international postal codes. App is responsible for country/region appropriate validation.

field.name: city
field.title: City
field.comment: City, Town or Village Name.

field.name: country_id
field.title: Country ID
field.comment: Which Country does this address belong to.

field.name: phone
field.comment: Complete phone number.

field.name: merged
field.comment: True if transaction information were merged into the contact

field.name: cleaned
field.comment: True if personnal information were deleted from the transaction
